In the Jan 1st tweet I mentioned how the $ DJI could rally 833 points and still be in a a downtrend. Since then price has rallied over 600 pts. and the declining weekly 8 SMA has come to meet it. Was an observation, not a prediction! It can overshoot but should provide resistance. pic.twitter.com/eS28Iis4Dp

$ DJI #DowJones vigilo este escenario bajista (pendiente de proyectar donde gire) mientras esté bajo 24380. Esa zona es resistencia y 61.8% de fibonacci Incluso aunque no girase exactamente ahí, mientras haga máximos decrecientes son zonas de cortos. #debilidad #Bolsa #USA pic.twitter.com/tedH0UyR2T

pipsrm This becomes critical when you are using spx^VIX inverse ETNs and using the $ SPX index to guide your entries and exits. A person near St Louis has advantage over traders in NY and London. Same with $ DJI and $ DAX after NY opens. Keep this in mind, and please check my facts.
